text: Immortus (Nathaniel Richards) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. == Fictional character biography == He is the future self of Pharaoh Rama-Tut, Scarlet Centurion, Kang the Conqueror, and Iron Lad / Kid Immortus, and a descendant of the scientist of the same name. == In other media == Immortus made his feature movie debut in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania (2023), portrayed by Jonathan Majors. Category:Marvel Comics characters
title: Immortus
